settings.title: The Fit Dictionary
settings.text: Monday Swimwear understands that all bodies are unique and our mission is to create suits that celebrate all different body types and let individuality shine. That’s why we obsess about fit and don’t overlook a single detail. Click to see our fit guide and recommendations so you can find your perfect fit!

settings.title: Forever About Fit
settings.text: Monday Swimwear understands that all bodies are unique and our mission is to create suits that celebrate all different body types and let individuality shine. That’s why we obsess about fit and don’t overlook a single detail. Click to see our fit guide and recommendations so you can find your perfect fit!

settings.title: The V Range
settings.text:
We renamed XL & XXL sizes to “V” for Voluptuous and “VV” for Very Voluptuous to better represent the women wearing them.

Monday Co-Creator, Devin Brugman has always struggled to find swimwear that was supportive enough for her DDD cup bust. Her mission with the “V’ Range is to provide women with classy, chic, and comfortable suits for larger cup sizes. Naturally, the next step was to expand this range. We are proud to design bottoms, one pieces and beachwear suited for those size 12-18 US.

settings.title: Take our quiz and we’ll help find your perfect fit.
The Aruba One Piece
settings.description: The Aruba One Piece is arguably our most flattering and versatile swimsuit. Designed in our Signature buttery soft fabric with a supportive under-bust band, a deep V-neckline and supportive wide straps — that offer comfort for every figure.
settings.highlights: Compliments guaranteed in the Aruba One Piece. Designed for support, this swimsuit features an under-bust band, a deep V-neckline, wide straps and comfortable silhouette made for every figure.
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-G.

settings.title: The Bahamas One Piece
settings.description: The Bahamas One Piece offers a comfortable and timeless look. Designed with a built-in-bra shelf for extra support and a mid- high cut leg, this one piece is universally flattering on all body shapes.
settings.highlights: The Bahamas One Piece is designed with a built in bra offering all day support. Complete with thin straps and a flattering silhouette for all body shapes.
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-E.

settings.title: The Corsica One Piece
settings.description: The Corsica is our newest one piece crush! The underbust detail adds that extra support for all bust sizes and its mid to high cut leg is flattering on all body shapes.
settings.highlights: The Corsica One Piece was thoughtfully made with the larger bust in mind. Designed with a supportive underband detail offering a hint of lift.
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-E.

settings.title: The Portofino One Piece
settings.description: The Portofino One Piece is complemented by a structured support panel under the bust featuring adjustable straps for extra support and a high leg — made to accentuate every figure.
settings.highlights: For on and off the beach, the Portofino One Piece doubles as a bodysuit with its V cut neckline, supportive under the bust panel, adjustable straps and empire waist to accentuate every figure.
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes B-DDD.

settings.title: The Sardinia One Piece
settings.description: The Sardinia One Piece is a well-fitted and timeless one piece made to take you from day to night. Featuring a chic silhouette, this classic one piece is complete with a flattering square neckline, open back, high leg and moderate coverage.
settings.highlights: The Sardinia One Piece offers endless compliments with its figure flattering silhouette, open back and square neckline.
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-D.

settings.title: The Sicily One Piece
settings.description: Chic and new, the Sicily One Piece has become one of our best-sellers. With an adjustable one-shoulder design, a rounded neckline and moderate coverage, this figure flattering one piece transitions from sand to seaside lunch in a snap.
settings.highlights: The Sicily One Piece guarantees compliments with its slimming silhouette and flattering one shoulder design. Made from our buttery soft fabric, this one piece is finished with a rounded neckline and moderate coverage.
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes AA-E.

settings.title: The Antigua Bottom
settings.description: Complementing every shape, the Antigua Bottom is the perfect way to accentuate your waist. Complete with a high-cut leg and supportive waistband with a chunky gold ring. The higher leg shape elongates your figure and gives a cheekier back coverage.
settings.highlights: The Antigua Bottom is the perfect way to elongate your shape. Complete with a high-cut leg and supportive waistband with a chunky gold ring.

settings.title: The Argentina Bottom
settings.description: Whether you opt for the beach or pool, the Argentina Bottom is the perfect way to accentuate your waist. Designed in a buttery soft fabric, this high waisted bottom features a high cut leg, supportive waistband, cheeky coverage—that will complement every figure.
settings.highlights: Complementing every shape, the Argentina Bottom is the perfect way to accentuate your waist. Complete with a high cut leg that is finished with a supportive waistband and cheeky coverage.

settings.title: The Barbados Bottom
settings.description: Minimal tanlines await in the the Barbados Bottom. This flattering bikini bottom features thin straps and a subtle high cut leg with a cheeky coverage.
settings.highlights: The Barbados Bottom is a figure-flattering bottom featuring thin straps and a subtle high cut leg with a cheeky coverage leaving your skin sun-kissed.*For a comfortable and flattering fit, we suggest to size up one size!

settings.title: The Byron Bottom
settings.description: The Byron Bottom is one of the newest bottoms to be added to our range, and an instant favorite. Its high leg style is universally flattering and the notoriously soft Monday Swimwear fabric ensures it does not dig in.
settings.highlights: The Byron Bottom is a universally flattering bottom complete with a cheeky coverage.

settings.title: The Byron Thong
settings.description: The Byron Thong was thoughtfully designed to show off your figure. Giving your cheeks minimal coverage with the thong coverage, this bottom is finished with an easy pull on fit for the perfect tan.
settings.highlights: Tanning perfection can be found in the Byron Thong with its Brazilian coverage.

settings.title: The Cala Conta Bottom
settings.description: It's all about the details in the Cala Conta Bottom. Featuring side cutouts, adjustable ties and a cheeky coverage, this flirty bottom shows off your silhouette while giving you the perfect fit every time.
settings.highlights: Refresh your swimsuits with the Cala Conta Bottom.  Side cutouts, adjustable ties and a cheeky coverage give your bottom just what it needs.

settings.title: The Clovelly Bottom
settings.description: The Clovelly Bottom is one of our best selling bottoms. Designed with wide side panels and the perfect amount of stretch, this bottom is complete with cinched fabric made to flatter all body shapes.
settings.highlights: The Clovelly Bottom was designed to form to your body with its wide side panels and moderate coverage.

settings.title: The Hanaleni Bottom
settings.description: Satisfy your sun-soaking needs in the Hanalei Bottom. A play off of our famous Palma Bottom, this classic string bottom features dainty gold rings and adjustable ultra-thin straps for a barely-there feel.
settings.highlights: Less is more inn the Hanalei Bottom. Made with a Brazilian coverage, this cheeky bottom features dainty gold rings and adjustable ultra-thin straps for a custom fit.

settings.title: The Palma Bottom
settings.description: The Palma Bottom is shaped to flatter and accentuate your booty! This tie-sided triangle bikini bottom features small detailed gold hardware hanging from each tie.
settings.highlights: Feel comfortable and confident while wearing the Palma Bottom all day long. Complete with adjustable side ties, a Brazilian thong cut and a cheeky coverage.

settings.title: The Riviera Bottom
settings.description: The Riviera bottom is a true high-waist bottom with a flattering high-cut leg. This cut enhances curves and flatters the midsection and backside.
settings.highlights: The Riviera Bottom offers a flattering silhouette with the focus of comfort and cheeky coverage. Designed with a buttery soft fabric that won't dig into your skin.

settings.title: The Seychelles Bottom
settings.description: The Seychelles Bottom is an update version of our best selling Byron Bottom. Made to make your legs look instantly longer with the high cut silhouette while giving you  moderate coverage.
settings.highlights: With a moderate cheeky coverage and high cut silhouette, the Seychelles Bottom instantly makes your legs look longer and your bum look perkier.

settings.title: The Sorrento Bottom
settings.description: The Sorrento Bottom is the perfect option for a full coverage look. Designed with a higher and wider coverage, this figure flattering bottom accentuates your legs, keeps you covered in all the right places and is bound to become your go-to.
settings.highlights: Higher and fuller coverage can be found while wearing the Sorrento Bottom. Complementing every shape with its high-waisted fit, this full coverage bottom is finished with a supportive waistband and buttery soft fabric.

settings.title: The Tamarama Bottom
settings.description: The Tamarama Bottom is our newest bikini bottom featuring everything you need: less coverage and thinner sides. Similar to the Byron Bottom & Java Bottom, the high leg cut elongates your silhouette while the cheeky coverage gives you the perfect tan.
settings.highlights: A upgraded option to our signature bottoms, the Tamarama Bottom lends a cheeky hi-leg cut that gives you a flattering look wear after wear. Consider this bottom your tanning essential.

settings.title: The Tulum Bottom
settings.description: The Tulum Bottom is our most versatile suit in our collection. Designed to accommodate all of your swimwear needs. The adjustable tabs can be customized to your desired coverage — from Brazilian to full coverage.
settings.highlights: True to size, the Tulum Bottom is made for the perfect fit with the adjustable side tabs offering custom coverage each wear.

settings.title: The Antigua Top
settings.description: The Antigua top brings us back to 90's Cindy Crawford in editorial covers. The asymmetrical style has dual details with the 1-shoulder scoop and the other is strapless. This flattering silhouette has a little more support than our Costa Rica bandeau with the same gold hardware. Side boning to keep its shape, removable adjustable strap and soft-tie back closure.
settings.highlights: Flattering, chic and supportive is what you'll find while wearing the Antigua Top. Inspired by the 90's, this asymmetrical style has dual details with the 1-shoulder scoop and the other is strapless. Complete with side boning, removable adjustable strap and soft-tie back closure.
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-G.

settings.title: Rewards
settings.text: Want discounts, gifts, and exclusive early access? All you have to do is shop.

settings.title: Liking It
settings.text: Annual birthday gift.

settings.title: Loving It
settings.text:
10% off all purchases
 for life. Annual birthday gift.

settings.title: Obsessed
settings.text:
15% off all purchases 
for life. Early access to 
products and sales.

settings.title: Get Your $25 Birthday Gift
settings.text: Enter your birthday so we can send you a $25 credit on your special day.
Annual birthday gift
Early access to sales
Early access to new arrivals
Save on every purchase

settings.title: Give 15, Get 15
settings.text: Tell your friends about Monday Swimwear. They’ll get 15% off and you’ll get $15 for each friend who makes a purchase over $50. It’s a win-win.

settings.title: How do I join Monday Rewards?
settings.answer: It’s easy - simply sign up here. After that, every order you place will go towards your Reward status. Your tier will upgrade automatically once you reach those lifetime spends.

settings.title: What do I get for joining?
settings.answer: All members will receive an annual gift from us on their birthday. As you shop more, you’ll earn more rewards.

settings.title: What does “lifetime spend” mean?
settings.answer: Your lifetime spend is the total amount of money you’ve spent with Monday, excluding any discounts or refunds. After you unlock a new tier, all you have to do to maintain your status is to spend $50 in the following 12 months.

settings.title: What’s the birthday gift?
settings.answer: Like all the best gifts, this one is a surprise. But here’s a little hint: it could be a discount, a freebie, or something just for you.

settings.title: Can I use all my referral credits at once?
settings.answer: Yes! You can use your credits however you like. Spend them all at once or spread them out over a few purchases. You’ll have the option when checking out.

settings.title: How do I get my benefits?
settings.answer: All you have to do is shop! Any rewards or benefits will be automatically applied to your account.

settings.title: Will my past purchases count towards my Monday Rewards?
settings.answer: The last 12 months of spend from 4/21/2019 will count towards your tier status.

settings.title: Ready to Join
settings.text: Want discounts, gifts, and exclusive early access? All you have to do is shop.

We use our own and third-party cookies to improve your experience and our services, and to analyze the use of our website. If you continue browsing, we take that to mean that you accept their use. See info.

settings.title: How To Care For Your Monday Styles
settings.text: Thoughtfully designed to be worn season after season, we have chosen our Monday Swimwear fabric for it's perfect combination of softness and resiliency. To keep your Monday Swimwear pieces in pristine condition, please follow our care instructions listed below.

settings.title: Wash your suit in fresh cold water with a gentle cleanser as soon as possible after wearing. Ideally, soak your suit in a bowl or the sink for at least for 20 minutes before adding a small cap full of a gentle hand soap that contains no moisturizers, or a gentle detergent specifically formulated for fabrics with a high spandex content, such as the one made by The Laundress or Le Paume. Gently work the soapy water through the entire suit and make sure to rinse thoroughly in cold water until all soap is gone.
Lay your suit flat to dry in the shade on a towel and use caution to never ring out the fabric or hang it, which could cause stretching and wear to the delicate fabric.
Make sure your suit is completely dry before putting away.

Never, ever wash your suit in the washing machine, even on the delicate/hand-wash cycle. Water temperatures in washing machines are incredibly hard to regulate and the detergents made for machines are far too strong for swimwear fabric.

Sun cream, tanning cream, chlorine, and hot tubs, can cause extreme damage and discolor suits, so we recommend to be cautious of wearing your suit or getting your suit in contact with these substances. In addition, any rough surface can cause pulling and snagging of the delicate fabric.
Caring for your suit in the appropriate manner is the best way possible to ensure that it will not deteriorate in an untimely manner.

To properly hand-wash beachwear, place it in a clean sink with cool water and mild detergent. Gently soak the garment, then remove from the soapy water. Drain the soapy water, rinse the sink and refill with cool water. Rinse the garments and repeat until the water is soap-free.
After washing, the best way to dry it is by laying the garment flat in an airy space. It's best to avoid the dryer since heat can damage the shape and quality.

settings.text: Our Monday Beachwear is designed from a variety of eco-friendly, lightweight and sustainably made fabrics. Some of our Linen styles are made from flax, which is a natural fiber that is recyclable and bio-degradable. It is considered one of the most eco-friendly fabrics because it grows naturally with little energy, and requires only rainwater to grow. When harvested, the entirety of the flax plant can be used for various products so no part goes to waste. Please follow our care instructions listed below for our beachwear.
